name: ultraskor.com
description: ultraskor.com - A live score app built using ReactJS, NodeJs, Express and MongoDB that provides live coverage for almost all football leagues
author: Mustafa Cakir

scripts.dev: yarn install && concurrently "nodemon --watch ./ server.js" "nodemon --watch serverProxy.js serverProxy.js"
scripts.prod: yarn install && concurrently "pm2 restart server.js" "pm2 restart serverProxy.js"
scripts.prod-server: yarn concurrently "pm2 start server.js" "pm2 start serverProxy.js"
